paragraph.paragraph: The search facilities provided by Visual Studio .NET's vxurfObjectBrowserS 0 Object Browser are fully supported by EiffelEnvision projects. Searching for "objects" in the vxurfObjectBrowserS 0 Object Browser is done via the vxurfFindObjectDialogBoxS 0 Find Symbols dialog. For more information on searching the vxurfObjectBrowserS 0 Object Browser , see vxtskSearchingObjectsS 0 Searching for Symbols: Objects, Definitions and References

After performing a search the vxurfFindObjectResultsWindowS 0 Find Symbol Results Window will be opened, if not already so. The results window will contain will show the complete results of a performed search based on your specified search options and parameters. To navigate to a corresponding symbol, double-left click on the item in the vxurfFindObjectResultsWindowS 0 Find Symbol Results Window . The index.xmlObject Browser or a corresponding document will be opened, in the editor, at the appropriate location.
